mapper.insert: insert into user_private_message(UID, UID2, UNAME2, REPEATTIME, REPEATCONTEXT, REPEATSTATUS) values(#{uid}, #{uidFrom}, #{userNameFrom}, #{repeatTimeFrom}, #{repeatContextFrom}, #{status})
mapper.select: select UID, UID2, UNAME2, REPEATTIME, REPEATCONTEXT, REPEATSTATUS FROM user_private_message

select UID, UID2, UNAME2, REPEATTIME, REPEATCONTEXT, REPEATSTATUS FROM user_private_message where UID = #{uid} and UID2 = #{uidFrom} UNION ALL select UID, UID2, UNAME2, REPEATTIME, REPEATCONTEXT, REPEATSTATUS FROM user_private_message where UID = #{uidFrom} and UID2 = #{uid} ORDER BY REPEATTIME
select COUNT(UID2) from user_private_message where UID = #{uid} and REPEATSTATUS = false
